channel.title: HELP with mute please... [delta]
channel.description: I saw this on a server and i was hoping someone would show me how to make this, well what they would do was ::tempmute me 10, so now i would be muted for 10 mins, how can i make that? like make it so when i type in the time limit i want it mutes them for that long... The best thing i have to offer is admin on my server :\ or 3m rsgp

item.title: HELP with mute please... [delta]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

xmonster:

I saw this on a server and i was hoping someone would show me how to make this, well what they would do was ::tempmute me 10, so now i would be muted for 10 mins, how can i make that? like make it so when i type in the time limit i want it mutes them for that long… The best thing i have to offer is admin on my server :\ or 3m rsgp

A simpler way to do this would just be to add a timer to the mute command already created in your client.java file.

Read full topic
